description: Updates an existing pull through cache rule.

parameters.name: ecrRepositoryPrefix
parameters.description: The repository name prefix to use when caching images from the source registry.

nested_items.name: ecrRepositoryPrefix
nested_items.description: The Amazon ECR repository prefix associated with the pull through cache rule.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The registry ID associated with the request.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in JavaScript date format, when the pull through cache rule was updated.

nested_items.name: credentialArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager secret associated with the pull through cache rule.

nested_items.name: customRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role associated with the pull through cache rule.

nested_items.name: upstreamRepositoryPrefix
nested_items.description: The upstream repository prefix associated with the pull through cache rule.
